sentences.sContent: From the low-growing Indian rhubarb to the mighty English maples, the plants in this region get ready for the winter with a cornucopia of colors.
sentences.sContent_eng: From the low-growing Indian rhubarb to the mighty English maples, the plants in this region get ready for the winter with a cornucopia of colors.
sentences.sCn: 从低速度生长的印度大黄到巨大的英国枫树，这一地区的植物用丰富的色彩为冬天的到来做好准备。

trans.tranOther: a plant with broad leaves. It has thick red stems that can be cooked and eaten.
